about_the_game:
808 is a first-person walking simulator with a strong, immersive narrative.

Story will take you on a journey through love, loss, fighting mythical creatures, visiting art galleries, working as a waiter in a restaurant, trying to survive a blizzard... and apparently the boundaries of reality itself.

Set "inside" a skyscraper, 808 begins with a plot so classic yet powerfull: "A guy loves a girl and will do anything to get her. But there are always things happening in the world and some of them, unfortunately, can make it difficult for our lovers to get together."

Inside the skyscraper, you're trying to get to the top, with flowers in your hands, to your date. But floor by floor, you will realize that somethings are different. We're still in the skyscraper, right? Weren't you just a guy, came to a luxurious 808-story skyscraper for a date?

Interestingly enough, this is not a love story. And you are not here to play the game. You can only witness what happened, is happening, will happen. We want to see you dare to do more. We know you will dare to do more, until the point where you become a part of the game.

And then it will desperately start again, and again, and again.

808 is a first-person walking simulator with a strong, immersive narrative.

Story will take you on a journey through love, loss, fighting mythical creatures, visiting art galleries, working as a waiter in a restaurant, trying to survive a blizzard... and apparently the boundaries of reality itself.

Set "inside" a skyscraper, 808 begins with a plot so classic yet powerfull: "A guy loves a girl and will do anything to get her. But there are always things happening in the world and some of them, unfortunately, can make it difficult for our lovers to get together."

Inside the skyscraper, you're trying to get to the top, with flowers in your hands, to your date. But floor by floor, you will realize that somethings are different. We're still in the skyscraper, right? Weren't you just a guy, came to a luxurious 808-story skyscraper for a date?

Interestingly enough, this is not a love story. And you are not here to play the game. You can only witness what happened, is happening, will happen. We want to see you dare to do more. We know you will dare to do more, until the point where you become a part of the game.

And then it will desperately start again, and again, and again.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB Memory
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: 808 is a surreal and introspective first-person narrative experience about a man, who came to a luxurious 808-story skyscraper to visit the girl he was dating.
